Room.Name: Elise's Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the chambers of Elise, the most powerful mage in Kista.
Room.LongDescription: She is young, but mastered her art at a very early age, and now has many years experience. Seeing what she has collected in this room, you realize it must take a great deal of intelligence and courage to want to become a master of the magick arts. There are strange things here, some with arcane runes and symbols on them. A glowing blue stone set in the wall seems to pulse with the runes IHN and JUX. It would be better not to use that.
